channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ND
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ND

item.title: Report E-2023080802
item.description:
Report E-2023080802

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-16T00:32:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-03-22
  • City: DUNN CENTER
  • State: ND
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: MARATHON PETROLEUM COMPANY LP
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: When loading, the Coriolis system malfunctioned and the driver did not notice the Titan gauges showing overfill. The Coriolis system failed to switch compartments leading to spillage.
